subject: I’m Robert Russell by name fro
body:
I’m Robert Russell by name from the United Nations I’m texting regarding your fund worth 800 thousand dollars signed a month ago by the United Nations Secretary and is set to be delivered/transferred you as soon as possible. I may wish to inform you that this is the only fund you have in your name and also the last chance you have to claim this fund so if there is any other person texting you regarding fund that is absolutely a scam and should be reported to the appropriate authorities at once.
 
If you are ready to receive this fund as soon as possible please get back to me now with your full details such as:
Your full name
Your home address
Your phone number
Your ID card
Your occupation
 Please do that as soon as possible because this is the last time you will have the chance to receive this fund
 
Thank you so much and God bless you.

subject: Re: I’m Robert Russell by name fro
body:
Hello Robert Russell,

Wow, this is such an unexpected surprise! I can't believe the United Nations has a fund in my name. Can you tell me more about how this happened? 

Also, could you please explain why you need all that information from me? I'm just trying to understand the process better.

Thank you so much for reaching out and God bless you too!

Best wishes,
Hilda

subject: Re: I’m Robert Russell by name fro
body:
The required details is needed for confirmation that I’m contacting the
right beneficiary of this fund
